name: METBOMB
description:
METBOMB the Endless Runner! (Best played in full-screen!)

Inspired by many games from the past, such as, Metroid, Mega Man, and Mario Bros.

Music by: Metroid Metal

SFX from: sounds-resource.com

Sprite Sheets from: opengameart.org, spriters-resource.com, and sprites-inc.co.uk

Enjoy!
